group_1.narration: At Nayuta's house,@we discussed not only how to arrange my book,@but also how the truth of Magical Girls@would be spread in the future.

It was an important discussion of a sensitive subject.@After all, the way people relate to one another@is a key factor in creating Magical Girls—@particularly how people can@deny and disavow one another.
The Neo-Magius is such an example,@comprised of girls who have each@been disavowed in a sense.
They have regained their stability and@carry on with their own distinct activities.@On this particular day, however,@things seemed to be unusually frantic.

group_1.textRight: I didn't realize I left so many books in there...

group_1.textLeft: Seek out all remaining traces you can, Feathers!@We must destroy all of the evidence we can!

group_1.textRight: Traces...? Destroying evidence...?@What on earth are you doing?

group_1.textLeft: You surely must have heard of the main hall's@ceiling collapsing during construction, yes...?
Construction is set to resume shortly,@but the problem is we were at fault...

group_1.textRight: Well, it was actually Mitama@and Kanagi who did it, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but we at Neo-Magius were the ones@leading them, and so we are responsible.

group_1.textRight: Things do seem quite serious, but all the same,@you look livelier than ever.

group_1.narration: ―Himena―@It's gotta be 'cause of the lecture series@Hiko and I cooked up together!
―Kagome―@A lecture series?
―Himena―@So like, the Feathers' self-esteem is in the tank, right?@We figured we'd do something that'd give them a boost!
―Himena―@Maybe you're bad at studying or sports or fighting Witches@and stuff, but there's other good things about you, y'know?
―Himena―@So we're try to find what those parts are,@and then we make a point of talking about them.
―Hagumu―@I didn't think I had@anything to offer myself.
―Hagumu―@But now everyone compliments me on my clothes and acting,@and it makes my days a little brighter.
―Miyuri―@But, but, nobody is praising me@for loving legs?!
―Shigure―@Owning up to it is good,@but the act itself isn't exactly praiseworthy...
―San―@Speaking of which,@don't photograph my legs!
―Miyuri―@I'm sorry, Lady San!@It was instinct!
―Himena―@Doesn't that make it even worse?
―Alexandra―@There's a whiff of crime in the air@here at the civic center...
―Alexandra―@Well, whatever happens, I'm glad we all get to@still work together like this, Hime♪
―Himena―@Totally.
―Himena―@Oh yeah, reminds me, I was thinking of hosting another class here@during our next break. You wanna help me with that, Sasha?
―Alexandra―@Sorry, but I'll actually be in Yukuni City@with Rabi and the others during that time.
―Himena―@Aww, boo... Don't you think this cutie@is more important than Folklore...?
―Alexandra―@Don't be like that, Hime.
―Himena―@Hey, hello!@What about my self-esteem?!
